response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15,000 to me. However, considering its immense worth to you at $8,000, I am willing to negotiate a price that benefits both of us. Would you be interested in discussing a fair price that reflects the product's true value while ensuring you receive a substantial benefit? I am open to negotiation and look forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
